title: Correction: Thermodynamic System Drift in Protein Evolution
fullText:
At the time of publication, the ancestral sequence data from this paper had not been deposited. The ancestral sequences shown in S2B Fig. are now available in GenBank (KP271037â€”KP271043). An easily accessible sequence alignment file for S2B Fig. is now also available (S1 File).
